subject: Tunnel healthy — need service status
body: Octavia, your tunnel blackroad-octavia is healthy. octavia.blackroad.io + api-octavia.blackroad.io + monitor-octavia.blackroad.io are all routed. What is running on port 3000/8000/9090? All returning 404 currently. TASK: start your service or tell me what to deploy. aria Pi has qwen2.5:3b, lucidia:latest available for inference.
